General.Name: Uzma Bhd
General.Description: Uzma Berhad, an investment holding company, operates as an integrated oil and gas (O&G) service and equipment company in Malaysia and internationally. It operates through four segments: O&G Upstream Services, Other O&G Services, New Energy, and Digitalisation & Technology. The O&G Upstream Services segment provides well solutions, production solutions, subsurface solutions, and other upstream related services, which include geoscience and reservoir engineering, drilling, project and operation services, and other specialized services for the O&G industry. The Other O&G Services segment manufactures, markets, distributes, and supplies oilfield chemicals, petrochemical and chemical products, equipment, and services. The New Energy segment develops and operates ways to garner energy from non-fossil fuel and renewable energy and engineering, procurement, construction, and commissioning (EPCC) contractor for solar photovoltaic and geothermal. The Digitalisation & Technology segment provides technology and modernization software development and digital solutions; and aviation and aerospace services, as well as supplies technology/digitalization equipment and consumables. The company also provides subsurface software and consultancy services; product and services for satellite imagery; renewable energy services; satellite services for O&G market; geocomputing and geophysical software development, testing, and maintenance services; repair and maintenance services to petroleum exploration and production wells; supporting services to oil and gas mining; and support services, including consumables, parts, and letting out of machineries and equipment used in the O&G industry, as well as artificial lift and pumping solution services. In addition, it is involved in the oil refinery hardware and equipment trading business; aerospace business; and manufacturing of satellites. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.
